marklogic.body: RID I have a few questions to ask you. Did you really read the link you posted? Where did Masters say anything about "global warming" or "global"? Did you miss this part about the cause of the warm spell? The jet stream pattern features a large, southwards dipping bulge over the Western U.S., creating a trough of low pressure with Cold and snow, and a large, northwards looping bulge over the Central U.S., creating a record-strength ridge of high pressure. The Western U.S. trough has cut into a "cut-Off low" that is slowly drifting eastwards. What does your link say about whatâ€™s it like on the other side of that jet steam in Alaska and the NW coast? Remarkable late-season snow storm on West Coast Since Masters talks only about approx 2% of the globe, whatâ€™s it like in the other 98%? Then thereâ€™s the ultra progressive Romm who says it is â€œglobal warmingâ€ causing the unusual warm winter in the US but ignores the global data. DID THEY LOOK AT ACTUAL GLOBAL DATA which is showing a Colder than normal March globally, a Colder than normal year so far globally, a 3 year retreat in global temps , before making such statements and if so , how do they blame it being warm in one place when its Cold, and getting Colder everywhere else, on the OPPOSITE OF WHAT THE ACTUAL DATA SHOWS. http://climaterealists.com/index.php?id=9316 Personally I donâ€™t believe that if you read it you surely donâ€™t understand it.
